footer.address: Tashkent city, Yashnabad district, Cholpon MFY, Fergana road, 5a-house, room 26.

home.banner: Providing auditing and professional consulting services to help grow your business as it expands
home.about_company:
F-PLUS AUDIT Limited Liability Company audit organization was registered by the State Services Center on September 29, 2016. Since then, it has provided professional auditing and consulting services.

On March 15, 2022, our audit organization was included in the register of audit organizations authorized to conduct mandatory audits by the Ministry of Economy and Finance.

about.title: About Us
about.description:
International Standards on Auditing (ISAs), International Standards on Quality Control (ISQCs), International Standards for Analytical Reviews, and related services standards are issued by the International Auditing and Assurance Standards Board (IAASB) of the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC). These standards ensure trust and consistency in auditing practices.

In Uzbekistan, auditing activities are conducted based on these international standards, provided they do not conflict with national legislation. These standards are made available on the official website of the authorized state body for auditing, with permission from IFAC for publication in Uzbekistan. The procedure for recognizing and applying international auditing standards within the country is determined by the Cabinet of Ministers of Uzbekistan.

services.title: Our services
services.description: Provides audit services in the form of audit checks and other audit services.
items: Advice on the application of tax legislation, calculations on taxes and fees, drawing up declarations
Analysis of financial and economic activities and financial planning, including preparation of business plans, economic, financial advice and management advice.
Automation of accounting and financial reporting, development of recommendations for information security of financial information.
Organization of accounting, restoration, maintenance and formation of financial statements, including financial statements on International Financial Reporting Standards
Audit Commission of a legal entity (reviser), implementation of the duties of a trustee of investment assets

contact.title: Do you have any questions?
contact.description: We will be happy to assist you if you send us your information through our contact form. You can fill in the form or write us an email to. info@f-plusaudit.uz)

vacancy.title: Work with us!

• A convenient and centrally located office in the city of Tashkent fully provides opportunities for all auditors.
  • The opportunity to work together with a long team of experienced and qualified auditors.
  • High-level workflow fees include the costs associated with overseeing and managing each phase of a project.
